backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing access control, user approval, invite-only mode, user profiles, and match history storage for APA practice, Accepting Gifts, and Straight Shot game modes with CRUD operations and admin permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence fixes: auto-dead ball revert logic in ApaRackScoringPanel and React error #185 in PracticeGamePage with microtask delay.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities for the pool practice scorekeeper application.
frontend/docs/v48-modecard-resume-button: Documentation describing a UI-only change to ModeCard component that reorders buttons to show 'Start New Game' above 'Resume Game' without affecting any session logic or functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes including colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag and title describing the APA-style pool practice scorekeeper.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (home, practice, accepting gifts, straight shot, history, stats, admin), ThemeProvider, AuthGate, and error boundaries with RouteErrorFallback component.
frontend/src/components/accepting-gifts/: Table component displaying win/loss performance statistics grouped by starting ball count (2-7) for Accepting Gifts mode.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Reusable ball button component for APA scoring with four states (unscored, playerA, playerB, dead), hover colors based on active player, locked state support, and visual dead ball indicator with X overlay.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Provides utility functions for APA 9-Ball scoring, including ball value calculation with one-away rule logic and rack total computation ensuring 10 points per rack.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: React component for scoring individual APA 8-ball racks with ball-by-ball tracking, inning flow management, defensive shot counting, and automatic target detection for match completion.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match results summary showing winner, skill levels, points earned/needed, defensive shots, innings, PPI, and team match points for both players.
frontend/src/components/apa/MatchupAnaly: Dropdown menu component that extracts unique opponent names from official APA matches and allows selection for matchup analysis.
Enhanced matchup analysis dropdown with toggle for including practice matches, filters matches by opponent, and displays analysis panel for head-to-head statistics.
Panel displaying detailed head-to-head matchup statistics between a player and opponent, including win/loss records, PPI trends, and match history from both official and practice games.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Form component for creating or editing official APA match records with fields for date, opponent, skill levels, scores, innings, defensive shots, and notes with validation.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: React hook managing innings counter and turn flow for APA 9-Ball matches, incrementing innings when the bottom player completes their turn and preserving state across rack boundaries.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate component that enforces login and invite-only access control, showing loading states and redirecting unauthenticated or unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button component for Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing on logout and error handling for authentication state conflicts.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog component for creating and editing user profiles with name and APA skill level, automatically prompting new users and handling backend connection retries.
frontend/src/components/history/MatchHis: Table component displaying match history with bulk selection, deletion capabilities, and navigation to match details, showing date, results, PPI, and aPPI metrics.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header navigation, authentication status, admin controls, stats access, and footer, showing connection state while actor initializes.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: A button component that opens a confirmation dialog to permanently delete a match, using the useDeleteMatch hook and navigating to history or calling a callback after deletion.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: A reusable alert dialog component for confirming match termination with customizable title, description, and confirm text, supporting pending and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Displays a summary card for a match with mode badge, date, and mode-specific details (APA scores/skill levels, Accepting Gifts status, or Straight Shot results), with click navigation to match details.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: A card component for game mode selection that displays title, description, icon, and buttons to start a new game or resume an in-progress session if one exists.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Renders line charts for APA performance trends including PPI/aPPI, points scored, and defensive shots over time, using unified data sorted by timestamp with custom dot shapes for differentiation.
frontend/src/components/straight-shot/St: Displays a bar chart histogram showing the frequency distribution of shot counts across Straight Shot sessions.
Renders a table summarizing Straight Shot performance by ball count, showing wins, losses, and first win date for each ball count.
Displays a composed chart with bars and trend line showing shot count over time for Straight Shot sessions, including average shots calculation.
frontend/src/dev/straight-shot-spot-chec: QA checklist document for manually verifying Straight Shot (20-shot game) functionality remains intact, covering session start, shot entry, save, and history viewing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Provides a retry mechanism for actor initialization by clearing cached actor queries and triggering a refetch without requiring page refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend operations including match CRUD, user profiles, AG level management, and user approval workflows using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Defines the 12-level Accepting Gifts progression system (2+8 through 7+9) with helpers for level management, clamping, and computing next baseline level based on win/loss outcomes.
Manages Accepting Gifts game session state including attempt tracking, scoring logic (player vs ghost), and set progression in a race-to-7 format.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts and aggregates APA match statistics (PPI, aPPI, points, defensive shots) from both practice and official matches with independent field validation and null handling.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Defines APA 9-Ball skill level to points-to-win mapping (SL1=14 through SL9=75) with validation and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Implements APA 9-Ball 20-point match outcome conversion system based on loser's skill level and points pocketed, with threshold charts for each skill level.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA Practice match outcomes by determining the winner based on target scores, then using the loser's skill level and points to calculate match points for both players.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Handles APA 9-ball rack scoring with 10 points per rack, validates rack totals, and calculates PPI (points per inning) statistics for players across multiple racks.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaSkillLevelPredic: Predicts APA skill levels (1-9) from PPI and aPPI averages using defined ranges for both Official APA Tab and Detailed Player Stats page contexts.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaExpected: Provides the official APA Expected PPI lookup table with win percentage buckets (10-100%) and expected PPI values for skill levels 2-7.
Derives Official APA match outcomes (win/loss/unknown) by comparing player scores against their skill-level-based targets, with helpers to use saved or derived outcomes.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Calculates Official APA PPI (score divided by effective innings) and aPPI (adjusted PPI using expected values from win percentage for wins, raw PPI for losses) with full match context.
frontend/src/lib/history/matchHistoryRow: Builds formatted narrative strings for match history rows, displaying mode-specific details (Official APA, APA Practice, Straight Shots, Accepting Gifts) with scores and win/loss indicators.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Determines the effective match date timestamp for sorting, preferring user-entered dates for Official APA matches and falling back to system dateTime, with formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Exports buildOfficialApaMatchLog function that creates official APA match records with derived win/loss outcomes based on skill levels and scores, plus re-exports other match builders from the original file.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Contains builder functions for APA 9-Ball practice matches, Accepting Gifts drills, and Straight Shot sessions, generating match records with detailed player stats, scores, and computed outcomes.
frontend/src/lib/session/inProgressSessi: Provides centralized helpers for managing per-mode in-progress session state in sessionStorage, with separate slots for APA Practice, Accepting Gifts, and Straight Shot modes.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsPer: Computes Accepting Gifts performance statistics grouped by starting ball count (2-7), tracking wins and losses from completed race-to-7 sets.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsSta: Computes summary statistics for Accepting Gifts mode including total sessions and rolling average of ending object ball counts from the last N sessions.
Computes official APA match statistics including win rate, average PPI (last 10 matches), and average aPPI (best 10 of last 20), sorted chronologically by effective match timestamp.
frontend/src/lib/stats/straightShotStats: Computes comprehensive Straight Shot statistics including rolling/lifetime averages, lowest shot count, trend data, histogram data, and win/loss summary by ball count.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Main game page for the Accepting Gifts drill, managing game state (levels, scores, attempts), handling rack attempts, set completion, and saving matches to the backend with session persistence.
Displays the rules and instructions for the Accepting Gifts drill, explaining the 12-level progression system, match format (race to 7), and progression rules for wins/losses.

Start page for Accepting Gifts drill where users select their starting level, view rules, and begin a new session or resume an existing one with confirmation dialogs for overwriting in-progress sessions.
Live scoring page for APA 9-ball practice matches, managing rack-by-rack scoring, innings, defensive shots, session state persistence, and match completion with backend saving.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Setup page for APA practice matches where users enter player names, skill levels, handle lag selection, and manage existing session conflicts before starting a new match.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Edit page for official APA match logs, loading existing match data by ID and rendering the RealApaMatchForm in edit mode with navigation back to match details.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Entry page for logging official APA matches after the fact (not live scoring), rendering the RealApaMatchForm in create mode with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Displays an access denied page for invite-only apps with a button to request approval from the owner. Shows success confirmation after request is submitted.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Shows detailed information for a single match including player stats, scores, and mode-specific data (APA practice, official APA, straight shot, or accepting gifts). Includes edit and delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Displays all matches with filtering by mode (APA, Gifts, Straight), sortable by date, and toggleable between card and table views. Supports navigation back to stats or home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page displaying four mode cards (Official APA Match Log, APA Practice, Accepting Gifts, Straight Shot) with navigation to match history for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin-only page for managing user access approvals, showing pending/approved/rejected users with approve/reject actions. Includes toggle for invite-only mode and bulk reject functionality.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays aggregate APA statistics for a specific player including win rate, best 10 of 20 PPI/aPPI averages, and predicted skill levels. Includes matchup analysis dropdown.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: Deployment verification page with a checklist and quick navigation buttons to test routing to Home and Match History pages.
frontend/src/pages/stats/StatsPage.tsx: Main statistics dashboard with tabs for APA, Straight Shot, and Accepting Gifts modes, showing aggregate stats, charts, and performance metrics. Includes matchup analysis and navigation to detailed player stats.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Main game page for Straight Shot drill that tracks total shots taken, manages session state in sessionStorage, handles match saving with retry logic, and displays an end-match dialog with backend connection status.
Displays the rules for the Straight Shot drill: clear all balls in 20 shots or fewer to win, with the 8-ball pocketed last.
Start page for Straight Shot drill that displays moving average stats from last 10 matches, allows starting new sessions or resuming in-progress sessions, and locks player name to user profile.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Extracts readable error messages from unknown error types by checking for string, Error objects, nested error properties, and attempting JSON stringification.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Provides utility functions for normalizing and comparing player names case-insensitively, including matching against multiple names.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds URL-encoded route paths for player aggregate stats pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup functions for sensitive parameters.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a Promise with a timeout that rejects with an error if the promise doesn't resolve within the specified milliseconds.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme for container, fonts, shadows, and animations including accordion and sidebar components.
project_state.json: Project state tracking two fix requests: reverting auto-dead balls when 9-ball is unclicked in APA scoring, and fixing React error #185 during session abandon with setTimeout delay.
